text: Maybe I'm missing something here but my CrmAssociationTable component looks different than the one shown in the CRM data component demonstration Sample Project. When I use it, the search bar displays below the quick filter properties but in the sample project screenshots its above the quick filter properties. Attaching screenshots for reference... anything I can be doing here to have my table look like the one in the sample project or is the screenshot simply not reflective of what the CrmAssociationTable actually looks like in use?

Hi <@U04RDS77QF7>, thanks for the call out!

The association table has undergone some cosmetic changes since we published the sample app. The screenshot on the left is the current version.

I will get the screenshot in the sample app updated to reflect the current design!

:mega: :speaker: If you haven't yet, there's still time to register for tomorrow's event led by Developer HUG (HubSpot User Group), that is dedicated to UI extensions with live demos and sneakpeak into some of the upcoming items. <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-the-pbampj-of-crm-customization-react-based-custom-cards/>
oh interesting, I don't think I've seen cards like this yet
That looks like it's custom (chrome extension)
currently it's not possible to embed an iframe like that
Where did you get that gif from?
Will there be a recording of this event?
